title: Fastest supercomputers - number of computer cores 2019
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories for the x axis representing Location, and a y axis representing Number of cores.
The highest category is found at Sunway_TaihuLight__China where Number of cores is 10649600.0.
The lowest category is found at Lassen_United_States where Number of cores is 288288.0.
gold: This ranking lists the number of computer cores of the 10 fastest supercomputers . The fastest supercomputer as of June 2019 , Summit , operated by the Oak Ridge National Laboratory in Tennessee , China , had 2.4 million computer cores .
